name: dockerizalo
tagline: A platform for deploying Docker-based applications using prebuilt stacks
description: Dockerizalo provides an easy way to deploy and orchestrate Docker-based apps using pre-configured stacks. It includes automated setup scripts and templates for self-hosting common tools and services.

features.title: Pre
features.description: Deploy popular apps with ready-made templates. Instant deployment

features.title: Automated Setup
features.description: Scripts handle complex configuration automatically. No manual setup needed

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Library of common self-hosted tools. Quick stack deployment

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Simplified Docker Compose management. Streamlined operations

features.title: Homelab Ready
features.description: Perfect for personal server environments. Build your stack quickly

features.title: Self
features.description: Deploy everything on your infrastructure. Complete control and privacy
